name: CreateProjectBrief
description:
Create a new project brief in Asana.

Use this tool to create and initialize a new project brief within a specified Asana project. It returns the full details of the project brief after creation.

parameters.name: project_global_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project in which the brief will be created.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

parameters.name: project_brief_content
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the project brief to be created. It includes necessary properties like title, description, and any other fields required by Asana's API.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: List of properties to include that are excluded by default in the response. Provide as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true to format the response with line breaks and indentation for readability. Useful for debugging.
